tool_description: Creates precise coordinate mapping for redaction zones in documents based on privilege analysis and content sensitivity detection, preparing documents for automated redaction processing.

document_image_path.description: Path to the original document image file

privileged_text_segments.description: Text segments that require redaction based on privilege analysis

redaction_type.description: Redaction style: black_box, white_box, or pattern_fill

buffer_pixels.description: Additional pixels to include around identified text for complete coverage

include_headers_footers.description: Whether to redact standard headers and footers containing sensitive info

error_messages: Document image not found: The specified document_image_path does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid redaction type: Use one of [black_box, white_box, pattern_fill] for redaction_type parameter.
Buffer pixels out of range: buffer_pixels must be between 0 and 50 pixels.
Text mapping failed: Unable to locate privileged text segments in the document image. Verify OCR alignment.
usage: Provide the document_image_path and privileged_text_segments identified by privilege detection. Configure redaction_type and buffer_pixels for coverage, and set include_headers_footers if needed. Returns precise coordinates for redaction zones.

redaction_coordinates.description: Coordinate sets (x,y,width,height) for each redaction zone

total_redaction_zones.description: Total number of areas marked for redaction

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of document area that will be redacted

mapping_confidence.description: Confidence score (0-100) in the accuracy of text-to-coordinate mapping
